org.letras.ps.region.penconnector
Interface ISampleProcessor

All Known Implementing Classes:
RegionSampleProcessor
public interface ISampleProcessor

The ISampleProcessor interface provides method that are to be implemented in order to receive samples from a pen. A class which realizes this interface could for example aggregate samples to strokes and map them to regions.

Author:
niklas

Method Summary
 void handleSample(PenSample sample)
          send a sample to be processed by the sample processor.
 void penDown()
          tell the sample processor that the pen has been put down on the paper.
 void penUp()
          tell the sample processor that the pen has been lifted from the paper.
 void setConnectedPen(IPenConnection pen)
          set the pen connection so that ISampleProcessor can get information about the pen for which it is the delegate.
 

Method Detail

setConnectedPen

void setConnectedPen(IPenConnection pen)
set the pen connection so that ISampleProcessor can get information about the pen for which it is the delegate.

Parameters:
pen - the PenConnection

penDown

void penDown()
tell the sample processor that the pen has been put down on the paper.

handleSample

void handleSample(PenSample sample)
send a sample to be processed by the sample processor. Make sure that penDown had been called beforehand and penUp has not yet been called.

Parameters:
sample - the sample to be processed

penUp

void penUp()
tell the sample processor that the pen has been lifted from the paper.
